name: KSGL Remaster-ening: A dating sim
description:
THE REMASTER OF THE BELOVED AND VERY OUTDATED: KEYBOARD SLAM GAMER LOVE! ! 

the beta: https://shuegii.itch.io/keyboard-slam-gamer-love-demo

here's the the true story of Protagonist Boring Character, waking up from a long ass dream from the beta game's events where he feels that it's fate for him to woo Egirl Eisette! But the only thing is, he gets cucked by the power of anime tropes!

THIS GAME IS *NOT* FINISHED! Episode 1 is now released with more episodes to come!
